channel.title: Hello, im somewhat new to coding servers, so i would like some help :D
channel.description:
Well my first 2 questions were answered :p NEXT QUESTION:How do i get a shop from the starting place, the dummie room, to the party room? when i move then NPCs to where i want them, i cant access the shop that they own in the dummy room :\ help please?
~Jiber THANKS :p

item.title: Hello, im somewhat new to coding servers, so i would like some help :D
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

Safe zones:

Purpose: Creating Safe Zones

Difficulty: 1/10?

Server Base: Pimpscape - dont know about others Probably work

Need to know Copy & Paste / Adding co-ords

Edited: Client.java

I know this has been posted a thousand times before, but i thought it might help some people.

  1. Fistly Get the most South Western and North Eastern Area of which you want a safe zone.
    If you dont know how to do this, type ::coordson in the game to see your coordinates

  2. Put The South western co-ordinates in the two XXXX’s in order and the same for The Notheastern in YYYY’s

(absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= YYYY && absY <=YYYY) ||

for Example if i wanted a safe zone in these co-ords

SW:2400,2640
NE: 2417,2665

It would look something like this:

(absX >= 2400 && absX <= 2640 && absY >= 2417 && absY <=2665) ||

OK now where to put this:

Search for “(absX >=” without the quotes in Client.java

go right to the end of that line, and paste there.

CREDITS: 0% me 100% the person who made it

Read full topic
